text: Mehdi Karroubi (, born 26 September 1937) is an Iranian Shia cleric and reformist politician. He led the National Trust Party. After the 2009â€“2010 Iranian election protests, Karroubi was put under house arrest in February 2011. He was the speaker of the parliament from 1989 to 1992 and 2000 to 2004, and a presidential candidate in the 2005 and 2009 presidential elections. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the Islamic Consultative Assembly
title: Mehdi Karroubi
